## goup-util workspace info

Show information about the Go workspace

### Synopsis

Display information about the Go workspace, including the path to go.work
and all modules currently in the workspace.

If no path is provided, searches from the current directory.

```
goup-util workspace info [path] [flags]
```

### Options

```
  -h, --help   help for info
```

### SEE ALSO

* [goup-util workspace](goup-util_workspace.md)	 - Manage Go workspace files
